title: Looking for a top laner to play in a team
body:
Currently have 4 players and are looking for a 5th player. We are a team of 1 silver, 2 golds and 1 plat.  We are looking for a team mate to play with us long term and enter in tournaments sometime in the future.

Some basic requirements
-Good map awareness for tp's
-Must be able to work with teammates/work well in a team environment
 - Have good communication
 - Ability to understand things like lane swaps and rotation
-Available every Friday afternoon and weekend 
 - Be able to play multiple play styles (Aggresive, passive)
 - Champion pool of at least 3
 - Have Skype to communicate with the team
 - Have a microphone/speak English
 - No signs of toxicity

replies.body:
Hey im 5CG Biggles currently plat 5 top main obvs currently looking for a team I play more team orientated champions ive got a big pool in top lane my three best are {{champion:54}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:98}} . ive sent you a request


Regards biggles
Hi guys, may i inquire about joining :){{champion:57}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:82}}

Im not a top main but i play a fair bit of top i main{{champion:92}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:90}} 
but im always open to learning the meta

Hi, I am definately interested. I am a former Diamond 5 but my account got hacked and was unable to get it back due to me not remembering my password for my email. I am currently using XensionGayle to rank back up and Have been looking for a team for a while. I main top and support. Add me so we can talk.- XensionGayle{{champion:75}}

Hey.
I'm interested, I sent you a friend request.
Just PM me back on the account you sent this post on and I'll get back to you ASAP.
Thanks.
